item.title: LightOj 1347 (Aladdin and the Magical Lamp)
item.description: Idea Let’s think an easier version of this problem . We have to find the longest common substring of 2 strings . In that case , we concatenate 2 strings and build the suffix array . Now the answer is the max of all LCP(i,j) where i belongs to the suffix starting from the first string and j belongs to the suffix starting from the second string and LCP(i,j) means longest common prefix of suffix starting from i and j .
